articles.title: South Africa's Cyril Ramaphosa faces up to poor ANC election result - BBC.com
articles.description: President Ramaphosa says the result was a victory for democracy, but the ANC lost its majority for the first time.
articles.content:
President Cyril Ramaphosa has described South Africa's election results as a victory for its democracy, despite his African National Congress (ANC) party losing its majority for the first time.

articles.title: New bipedal dinosaur species unearthed in major Zimbabwe discovery - The Jerusalem Post
articles.description: Scientists discovered new dinosaur species, in Zimbabwe. The herbivorous dinosaur's remains date back to the late Triassic Period, highlighting Africa's paleontological potential
articles.content:
International scientists discovered the fossilized remains of a previously unknown species of dinosaur in Zimbabwe, Phys.org reported on Thursday.
